summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to an unspecified recipient, requesting the destruction of a draft FBI interview report dated August 12, 2019, related to the Epstein case. It highlights internal procedural communication regarding document handling.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email requesting the destruction of a draft FBI interview report related to the Epstein case.

events.title: Draft FBI Interview Report Created
events.description: A draft interview report relating to the FBI's interview in the Epstein case was created.

events.title: Request to Destroy Draft Report
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney requested the destruction of a copy of the draft FBI interview report dated August 12, 2019.

keyFacts: A draft FBI interview report related to the Epstein case was dated August 12, 2019.
On August 28, 2019, an Assistant U.S. Attorney requested the destruction of a copy of this draft report.
The communication originated from the Southern District of New York, indicating prosecutorial involvement in document management.
The request suggests procedural handling or potential sensitivity of the draft interview materials.
